member.name: M:Acme.WebApi.Controllers.DataController.Data(System.Int32)
member.summary: Minimal sample implementation of named backend-to-backend service.
member.remarks:
Supported arguments: 0 is default value and the Ok case, 1..3 give errors.
* Ok result - returns array of two strings * 1: 500 - InternalServerErrror, some exception * 2: 400 - BadRequest with title * 3: 404 - NotFound
member.param: A value 0..3 for different error conditions.
member.returns: An array with two sample strings.

member.name: M:Acme.WebApi.Controllers.DataControllerV2.Errors(System.Int32)
member.summary: Serveral Error implementations of version 2 of the versioned backend-to-backend service.
member.remarks:
Supported arguments: 0 is default value and the Ok case, 1..3 give errors.
* Ok result - returns array of two strings * 1: 500 - InternalServerErrror, An uncatched exception * 2: 500 - InternalServerErrror, An uncatched exception with inner exceptions * 3: 500 - InternalServerErrror, An uncatched exception with different inner exceptions
member.param: A value 1..3 for different error conditions.
member.returns: An array with two sample strings.

member.name: M:Acme.WebApi.Controllers.DataControllerV2.BadRequests(System.Int32)
member.summary: Serveral Bad request implementations of version 2 of the versioned backend-to-backend service.
member.remarks:
Supported arguments: 0 is default value and the Ok case, 1..3 give errors.
* Ok result - returns array of two strings * 1: 400 - BadRequest with modelstate errors * 2: 400 - BadRequest with modelstate errors (via ValidationProblem) * 3: 400 - BadRequest with details of `AcmeDataErrorDetails`
member.param: A value 1..2 for different error conditions.
member.returns: An array with two sample strings.
